name: IdentityMind
overview:
IdentityMind™ is an on-demand platform tracking Internet identities and providing next generation risk management and anti fraud services. IdentityMind™ helps online merchants stop fraud while maximizing accepting good transactions and minimizing manual review costs. Internet consumers are passively challenged by comparing the eDNA™ of the owner of the card to the eDNA™ observed at the time of the transaction.

IdentityMind™ was created at the beginning of 2009 by Taher Elgamal and Dan Kolkowitz, two well-known and experienced entrepreneurs with strong track records in Silicon Valley, California. They realized that there could be vast improvements in Card Not Present (CNP) fraud detection and developed a unique approach to reliably identifying the user behind each transaction.

IdentityMind™ is privately held backed by large financial institutions and private equity firms.
